txt.en: 'If you wish to go further into Moria, you will want to follow the road towards the Dolven-view. Perhaps you will encounter more dwarves along the way, and they can help you get there.\n\n'If you see any dwarves cut off from the rest throughout your travels, please endeavour to assist them! I fear this is a more dangerous place than we anticipated upon our arrival.'
'Hail, traveller! Behold Lamab-d√ªm; beautiful, is it not? If you have time, we could use your assistance, for we are very curious about what lies near here.'
'Follow the road towards the east...and do look out for any travellers you see along the way!'
Wegil has given you directions to follow the road towards the new Dolven-view camp in the Great Delving.
Follow the road further into Moria
The road heads east from Wegil and makes towards the Dolven-view.\n\nYou should follow the road towards the Dolven-view and stop to speak with any dwarf-travellers you see along the way.
